field.name: Analog Output, Bits
field.description: Number of bits of precision of output value.

sensorData.comment:
The output value must be reported using the correct precision and unit. Examples of units that could be used:
* `%` - for instance 0-100 % * `mA` - for instance 4-20 mA * `V` - for instance 0-10 V

parameter.name: Analog Output, Raw
parameter.description: Desired raw state of output. The int version must always be supported. If the range supports numbers larger than that supported by the int type, the device must also support the long version.
